This vignette introduces regDIF to the general user by providing common use cases.

## LASSO regularization for evaluating DIF in 2PL-IRT model, large lambda parameter --> no DIF effects
```{r,eval=T,message=F,echo=F}
library(regDIF)
head(ida)
x <- ida[,7:9]
y <- ida[,1:6]
fit <- regDIF(x, y, family = "bernoulli", penalty = "lasso", lambda = 2)
summary(fit)
```
